00025 class DeadNoiseConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject{
00026 
00027 public:
00028   
00031   DeadNoiseConstants() {};
00032   
00039   DeadNoiseConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, int deadLevel, int noiseLevel) {
00040     unsigned _cellId = (chip << 8) + channel;
00041     setCellKey(_cellId);
00042     obj()->setIntVal(1, deadLevel);
00043     obj()->setIntVal(2, noiseLevel);
00044   };
00045   
00046   DeadNoiseConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject(obj) {};
00047   
00048   virtual ~DeadNoiseConstants() {};
00049 
00052   int getDeadLevel() const {
00053     return getIntVal(1);
00054   };  
00055 
00058   float getNoiseLevel() const {  
00059     return getIntVal(2);
00060   };
00061   
00067   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00068     return (float) inputValue;
00069   };
00070   
00076   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00077     return (float) inputError;
00078   };      
00079 
00083   bool calibrationValid() const {
00084     return true;
00085   };
00086 
00092   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00093     return ((getDeadLevel() == 0) && (getNoiseLevel() == 0));
00094   };    
00095 
00098   void print (std::ostream& os);
00099   
00102   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00103     return "DeadNoiseConstants";
00104   };   
00105 
00108   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00109     return "i:CellKey,i:DeadLevel,i:NoiseLevel";
00110   };  
00111     
00112 };
00113 
00114 }
